Room.Name: Yellow Marsh Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Yellow Marsh Road, just north of the cliffs overlooking Othax.
Room.LongDescription: The River Othax flows smoothly across the plains of the city, originating from the high mountains outside of Oceancrest, eventually emptying into the Nylandian Bay. The relatively modest cliffs to the south might be interesting to climb, but there doesn't seem to be anything around. Looking up, you can see a solitary cloud a bit to the west.
